listing.listing_description:
Sun-dappled baked brick encircles the cobalt-tiled pool at this classic Caribbean villa at Tryall. The single-story, fully staffed home is thoughtfully designed, with Montego Bay views from nearly every room and flowering gardens scenting the air. Walk 10 minutes down Barnes Hill to put your toes in the sand or sip a smoothie made from grown-on-Jamaica mangoes at the Tryall Club beach restaurant. 

Your Casuarina holiday includes the services of a chef, butler, and two housekeepers, leaving you more time to paddle in the heated pool, devour a beach read in the loungers, or dine on fare from the barbecue and pizza oven at the al-fresco table. The cable TV and Wi-Fi are to be expected; the stunning all-white grand piano, however, makes a totally unexpected statement. 

This vacation rental is laid out over one level, making it easy for everyone in your family or group of friends to access. Baked-brick floors and traditional Jamaican lattice ceilings make for a classic backdrop in the two sitting areas and dining area for 8. Since your stay at this luxury property includes chef service, the fully equipped kitchen is for staff use. 

All 4 bedrooms at Casuarina have king beds, private en-suite bathrooms, TVs, and air conditioning, and two have honeymoon-suite-worthy touches such as al-fresco showers. If your group needs more flexible accommodations, 3 of the 4 beds can be separated into 2 twin beds. 

From the villa’s Sandy Bay location on Barnes Hill, it’s an 8-minute walk to your first round at the Tryall Golf Club and a 10-minute walk to a kayak trip or a cocktail from the Tryall Club beach restaurant. If you’re traveling with kids, take a day trip to Aqua Sol Theme Park or Kool Runnings Waterpark; if it’s just the grown-ups, it’s worth the drive to Appleton Estate Sugar and Rum Factory. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Feel the wet sand between your fingers as gentle tamping shapes a castle wall. Shells gathered by smaller hands wait in colorful pails. But a call for lunch from the villa breaks the spell as everyone heads to the terrace where they can eat and keep their eye on the construction until they return. Glorious sun-filled days stretch lazily at this seafoam green two-story beachfront townhouse. An open porch and terrace with a rustic slat walkway lead to the villa.  

Gated and child-friendly, Hummingbird Villa is central to many activities and offers a long list of amenities to members. The beautiful freshwater swimming pool with a wood deck surround rimmed with comfortable loungers is close to the clubhouse with restaurant. Interested in snorkeling or boating? Head over to the marina for rentals and a dockside café that serves coffee and breakfast. Also, there’s a Tiki bar that serves drinks on the beach. Tennis courts and a children’s playground are nearby. Friday night music and Sunday barbecues are an opportunity to gather as a community and make new friends. 

Hummingbird Villa offers special add-on amenities as well: spa services, fresh groceries, even childcare in case you want to go duty-free shopping at Harbour Bay Shopping Center just 10km away or have dinner with friends in Nassau, just a 10-minute drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Play in the luminous surf of Lorient Bay and return on foot to intimate dinners paired with vast Caribbean vistas. Perched on a verdant slope in Camaruche, this newly built villa features sweeping ocean views from its sandy sundeck, breezy interiors, and 3 king bedroom suites. Cater private festivities in your gourmet kitchen or celebrate at the famous nightspots of the North Shore and Gustavia.

A swimming pool (measuring 13.1 by 29.5 feet) is perched directly outside the villa's interior living areas and master bedroom, inviting you to a refreshing dip under the morning sun or evening stars. The sandy terrace is like a private slice of beach on your lofty perch, while Lorient Beach itself is a ten-minute walk downhill.

Ample thresholds open between the pool deck and interior living areas, infusing the home with fresh ocean air. This open-concept space includes a comfortable TV lounge under a vaulted ceiling, flanked by a fully equipped kitchen and semi-alfresco dining table. White surfaces accentuate the natural beauty and lush colors of the vistas, complementing the deft touches of sea-inspired décor.

Each of the bedroom suites features a king bed, mini-bar, safe, Apple TV, ensuite bathroom, and alfresco shower. The master opens directly to the pool, and all three bedrooms enjoy sea views.

In addition to Lorient Beach just down the road, you're a short drive from Nikki Beach, Petit Cul de Sac Beach, and St. Jean. Drive 15 minutes to Gustavia for a classic Caribbean cocktail, or catch the ferry to the extraordinary Saint Barthelemy Natural Preserve.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
_ CONSTRUCTION NOTE : Oil Nut Bay advises our guests that there is development activity occurring on property as additional villas are being constructed. Activity will vary depending on the time of year. Please inquire should you have any further questions. _

Carved into the cliffside, the three individual deluxe one-bedroom rental suites that make up The Cliffs are perfect for a vacation getaway or temporary residence if you’re an Oil Nut Bay homeowner creating your legacy home. Designed with vision and environmental integrity, each suite enjoys unobstructed views of the azure Caribbean Sea. This development is so remote it can only be reached by boat!

Everything has been designed to enhance the magnificent view, from the sliding glass doors and huge windows to the invisible balconies. Each suite boasts a large master bedroom, one and a half bathrooms and a luxurious great room. Private terraces and an inviting infinity edge plunge pool give you plenty of opportunity to top up your tan and you’re welcome to use all the Oil Nut Bay community amenities. The resort’s Beach Club boasts three pools, bars and restaurant and there’s a wellness center with fitness equipment and a yoga and Pilates room. Kids will especially love the programs and activities at the Nut House Kids’ Club and Nature Center. If work demands your attention, you can always use the onsite business center.

Step into your suite’s tranquil great room and you’ll immediately feel relaxed. Drop your cares into the ocean and settle in a comfortable sofa as you admire the picture-postcard view. Soft sand colors lend a restful vibe to this cliffside paradise and if you ever tire of the panorama there are plenty of entertainment options, including Apple TV with sound system. The resort’s restaurants are so good you don’t need a kitchen, although there is a small service area with a wet bar, mini fridge, microwave and coffee maker for preparing snacks and drinks. If you need anything at all, just ask your concierge.   

The master suite gives top priority to your rest and relaxation. You don’t even have to get out of your king-size bed to appreciate the Caribbean Sea – just prop yourself up against the pillows and watch the boats drift past. The en-suite bathroom is just as luxurious, with an outdoor shower, double sinks and a deep standalone tub.

With an electric golf cart at your disposal and great restaurants within walking distance, there’s no reason to stay at home. When you’re not swimming or lounging by one of the resort’s pools or enjoying light refreshments at the swim-up bar, take a yoga class or spa treatment or try a new watersport!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please Note : Though there is no kitchen unit within the villa, the number of restaurants within the resort encourage you to kick back, bask in the comfortable luxury of this property, and allow someone else to do the cooking for you. Bon appetit!

listing.listing_description:
Gearon is a beautiful villa nestled on a lofty perch overlooking sweeping vistas of Lorient Bay on the north shore of St. Barts. Located in the hilltop enclave of Petite Saline, the villa is walking distance to Lorient Beach and minutes by car from several other sought-after shores. The design blends rustic naturalism with contemporary elegance and offers ample living space for savoring the Caribbean sun and breeze. Three sea-view bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms and separate entrances accommodate six guests, forming an ideal arrangement for families or small groups of friends desiring serenity, convenience, and style in one of the most enchanting areas of Saint Barthelemy.

Settle into island time on the villa's terrace, sunbathing on elegant loungers and dipping into the infinite pool. In the afternoon, withdraw into the vaulted pavilion for cocktails and games, and gather around the ten-person dining table for alfresco feasts.

Vanishing walls and a central breezeway create a seamless space between the deck and interiors, inhaling the sea-kissed air into the cavernous living room and gourmet kitchen. The décor is understated yet exquisite throughout, with rich wood trim and accents offsetting luminous white finishes on the walls and ceiling beams, and fine artwork that conjures the timeless sprit of the island and sea. Lovely pendant ceiling fans keep you cool on balmy days.

Each of the three bedrooms—one with king bed, two with queens—enjoys a private entrance and features an esnuite bathroom, air conditioning, ceiling fan, safe, dual vanity, and screened windows. The lower-level room enjoys a private balcony, while the upper-level rooms open to the terrace. All of the rooms enjoy spectacular views of the sea.

From Gearon, you can walk about five hundred paces to Lorient Beach, or drive a few minutes by car to the sands of Marigot, Nikki, St. Jean, and Petit Cul de Sac. The Oasis shopping center is nearby, and the village or Lorient offers groceries and a fresh fish market. With Gustaf III Airport less than four kilometers away, Gearon is a convenient choice for easy weekend escapes or destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Whether it’s the stunning views of Saint Maarten and Anguilla, the warm breezes, the private hillside location or the chic, modern accommodations at this luxury villa that stand out, a stay at Ginger is an experience you won’t soon forget. A brand-new oasis in Le Domaine des Pairs, this five-bedroom Petite Saline vacation rental is perfect for a honeymoon, a romantic getaway or a beach escape.

A terrace with incredible ocean views runs the length of the house, inviting you to step outside and have a swim in the infinity pool, stretch out on a lounge chair, or sip a cool drink at the shaded lounge area. Prepare local produce on the barbecue and enjoy at the al-fresco dining area, then take a final dip in the hot tub to round out the day. Fitness devotees will appreciate the exercise room (and juice bar), tech enthusiasts will want to use the Apple TV and Wi-Fi, and everyone will enjoy the wine fridge.

Ginger takes traditional Caribbean villa architecture—low-slung, peaked roofs, wood decking—and gives it a modern update. Huge sliding glass doors let you open the living spaces to the terrace, creating one large indoor-outdoor living area, and sleek white sectionals and contemporary dining chairs bring a bright, breezy feel indoors. The fully equipped kitchen is open to the living room (and the ocean beyond) on one side and the courtyard on the other, so the space is always full of light and air.

Each of the five bedrooms at Ginger has a queen bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and ocean views, making the villa feel like a private luxury resort. Like the rest of the house, the bedroom suites are minimalist but not cold, with polished concrete floors, mid-century modern-inspired furniture in shades of walnut and white, and cerused-look wood paneling for texture. In the bathrooms, dual vanities are a thoughtful touch for couples.

Though you’ll hardly want to leave the villa, you simply can’t miss the beaches of St. Barts—and luckily, Lorient Beach is only a 2.5 km drive away. Treat yourself to some shopping or a dinner out in Gustavia, 7.1 km away by car, and at the end of your stay, plan on a 4.9 km drive from Ginger to Gustaf III Airport.

Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
